text: læa hnung cak sayyan thanghlay khxng phraxngkh khux phraxngkh thrng sng lm penkar cæng khawdi thanghlay læa pheux phraxngkh ca thrng hı phwk cea di lim rs khwam metta khxng phraxngkh læa pheux reux dein thale ca di læn pi doy phra baycha khxng phraxngkh læa pheux phwk cea ca di sæwngha cak khwam pordpran khxng phraxngkh læa pheux phwk cea ca di khxbkhun
